faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitleDesc: Everything you need to know about Nokta One

whatIsNokta.question: What is Nokta One, exactly?
whatIsNokta.answer:
Nokta One is a body and nervous system reset technology. In seconds, it identifies when your body is "off" and suggests a simple micro-action to return to a functional, clear, and high-performing state.

It's not meditation, therapy, or medical monitoring.
It's an immediate adjustment tool, usable in real-life situations.

whenUseful.question: When is Nokta One useful?
whenUseful.answer:
Nokta One is designed for moments when you think:

â€¢ "I don't feel well, but I don't know why"
â€¢ "I'm tense for no clear reason"
â€¢ "I can't concentrate"
â€¢ "My body is tired, but my mind wants to keep going"
â€¢ "I'm not at my best"

These moments happen before important meetings, after mental overload, between demanding tasks, before sports or competitions, at the end of the day when your body gives out, or in the morning when energy is low.

Nokta One is designed for these daily micro-imbalances, not for medical situations.

whyOffButOk.question: Why do I sometimes feel "fine" but not function properly?
whyOffButOk.answer:
Because your body and nervous system can be out of sync.

You might:
â€¢ Have a good heart rate but feel overwhelmed
â€¢ Be mentally calm but physically restless
â€¢ Be motivated but unable to start

NOKTA ONE is based on the principle that bodily sensation comes before mental performance.

differentFromOthers.question: How is NOKTA ONE different from traditional wellness apps?
differentFromOthers.answer:
Most apps ask you to:
â€¢ Understand how you feel
â€¢ Choose a practice
â€¢ Commit for a long time

NOKTA ONE does the opposite:
â€¢ It starts from the bodily signal, not your analysis
â€¢ It reduces the choice to a single action
â€¢ It acts in under 30 seconds

Less thinking, less friction, more impact.

analyzeEmotions.question: Does NOKTA ONE "analyze" my emotions?
analyzeEmotions.answer:
NOKTA ONE doesn't judge you or make any assessments.

It only observes neutral bodily indicators (posture, tension, visible micro-signals) to estimate an overall functional state.

The goal is not to tell you "how you feel," but to detect when your body isn't aligned with what you want to do.

replaceProfessional.question: Does NOKTA ONE replace a healthcare professional?
replaceProfessional.answer:
No.

NOKTA ONE is a daily regulation tool, not a medical device. It doesn't address any conditions, make any therapeutic promises, and never replaces medical advice.

It's designed for functional, active, demanding people who want to stay at their best without waiting to feel unwell.

whyBodyNotMind.question: Why act on the body rather than the mind?
whyBodyNotMind.answer:
Because in most cases:
â€¢ The mind follows the body
â€¢ Clarity comes after regulation
â€¢ Performance returns when the nervous system is stable

A well-targeted micro-action can produce an immediate effect, where a mental approach takes more time.

howOften.question: How often should I use NOKTA ONE?
howOften.answer:
NOKTA ONE doesn't impose any rhythm.

Some use it:
â€¢ 1-2 times a day for a quick check
â€¢ Before a key moment
â€¢ Only when "something feels off"

The goal is not dependency, but autonomy.

forAthletesOnly.question: Is NOKTA ONE just for athletes or entrepreneurs?
forAthletesOnly.answer:
No, but it's particularly useful for those seeking:
â€¢ Clarity
â€¢ Consistency
â€¢ Sustainable performance

The launch targets the US market, which is very performance-oriented, but NOKTA ONE is designed for all cultures, ages, and lifestyles.

dontBelieveBreathing.question: Does it work even if I don't believe in "breathing techniques"?
dontBelieveBreathing.answer:
Yes, because NOKTA ONE doesn't rely on belief.

The proposed micro-actions are:
â€¢ Simple
â€¢ Short
â€¢ Based on known physiological mechanisms

You don't need to "believe" anything.
You do the action, you observe the effect.

whySoShort.question: Why such short actions?
whySoShort.answer:
Because the nervous system often responds better to:
â€¢ Clear signals
â€¢ Brief stimulations
â€¢ Sharp interruptions of the previous state

30 well-targeted seconds can be more effective than 10 poorly engaged minutes.

dataPrivacy.question: Does NOKTA ONE collect sensitive personal data?
dataPrivacy.answer:
NOKTA ONE applies a maximum data minimalism approach.

â€¢ No medical exploitation
â€¢ No data resale
â€¢ No intrusive interpretation

Information is only used to enhance the user experience.

allLanguages.question: Does NOKTA ONE work in all languages?
allLanguages.answer:
Yes.
NOKTA ONE launches in 12 languages, with a focus on universal sensation, not complex vocabulary.

The body speaks the same language everywhere.

whoIsItFor.question: Who is NOKTA ONE really for?
whoIsItFor.answer:
For those who:
â€¢ Want to stay functional without over-analyzing
â€¢ Feel when something "is off" but don't want to dramatize
â€¢ Seek a simple, quick, discreet tool
â€¢ Want to perform without burning out

NOKTA ONE isn't here to change you.
It's here to help you return to your normal state.

whyNow.question: Why now?
whyNow.answer:
Because the world is moving fast, the pressure is real, and many people are functioning in a degraded mode without realizing it.

NOKTA ONE meets a modern need:
To quickly recalibrate, without stopping life.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use the Nokta One application (hereinafter "the Application", "the Service" or "Nokta One"). Nokta One is published by a French company registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register (hereinafter "we", "our" or "the Company"). Our headquarters is located in Paris, France. By using our Service, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not accept this policy, please do not use our Service.

subsection1.title: 1.1 Data you provide directly
subsection1.profileExamples: First name, date of birth, country, preferred language
subsection1.paymentExamples: Billing information (processed by our payment provider)

subsection2.title: 1.2 Automatically collected data
subsection2.technicalExamples: Device type, operating system, application version

subsection3.title: 1.3 Biometric and facial analysis data
subsection3.localProcessingDesc: Images captured by your camera are analyzed directly on your device or via secure services. Raw images are never stored on our servers.
subsection3.derivedDataDesc: Only wellness indicators (anonymized numerical scores) are transmitted and stored to provide you with a history of your sessions.
subsection3.noIdentificationDesc: The analysis does not aim to identify you but only to detect general physiological signals (muscle tension, eye fatigue, etc.).
subsection3.noFacialRecognitionDesc: We do not use facial recognition technology to identify you.

subsection4.title: 1.4 Wearable data (optional feature)
subsection4.description: If you choose to connect a wearable device (watch, bracelet), we may collect:

subsection1.title: 2.1 Legal bases (GDPR)
subsection1.contractDetails: Necessary to provide you with Nokta One
subsection1.consentDetails: Only if you have opted to receive our emails

subsection2.title: 2.2 Detailed purposes
subsection2.item1: Provide and maintain the Service: Create your account, process your sessions, display your history
subsection2.item2: Personalize your experience: Adapt recommendations to your profile
subsection2.item3: Communicate with you: Important notifications, customer support, updates (if consented)
subsection2.item4: Improve our Service: Aggregated and anonymized analysis of usage trends
subsection2.item5: Ensure security: Detect and prevent fraudulent activities
subsection2.item6: Comply with legal obligations: Tax compliance, response to legitimate requests from authorities

section3.title: 3. Sharing your data
section3.noSale: We never sell, rent, or exchange your personal data for commercial purposes.

subsection2.title: 3.3 Other sharing cases
subsection2.legalObligationsDesc: Response to a court order or legal request
subsection2.rightsProtectionDesc: To enforce our terms of use
subsection2.businessTransactionsDesc: In case of merger, acquisition, or asset sale (you will be notified)

section4.title: 4. International transfers
section4.description: Some of our operations involve transferring data to countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA), particularly the United States.
section4.guarantee1: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission
section4.guarantee2: Transfer Impact Assessment (TIA) in accordance with EDPB recommendations

section5.title: 5. Data retention
section5.afterDeletion: After account deletion, your data is:
section5.afterDeletion2: Deleted for personally identifiable data (within 30 days)
section5.afterDeletion3: Retained only if a legal obligation requires it

section6.title: 6. Your rights
section6.description: Under GDPR and the French Data Protection Act, you have the following rights:
section6.accessDesc: Obtain a copy of your data
section6.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a structured format
section6.withdrawConsentDesc: Withdraw your consent at any time
section6.responseTimeDesc: We respond to any request within a maximum of 30 days.
section6.complaintDesc: You have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL (www.cnil.fr) if you believe that the processing of your data constitutes a violation of your rights.

section7.title: 7. Data security
section7.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
section7.encryptionDesc: Data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256)
section7.limitedAccessDesc: Principle of least privilege for our teams
section7.notificationDesc: In case of breach, notification within 72 hours in accordance with GDPR

section8.title: 8. Minors
section8.description: Our Service is intended for people aged 16 and over.
section8.age13to16: If you are between 13 and 16 years old, you must obtain the consent of your parent or legal guardian to use our Service.
section8.under13: We do not knowingly collect data about children under 13 years of age. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal data, we will delete it immediately.

section9.title: 9. Cookies and similar technologies
section9.description: Our Application uses local storage technologies for:
section9.managePreferences: You can manage your preferences in Settings > Privacy.

section10.title: 10. Automated decisions
section10.description: Our Service uses algorithms to provide you with personalized recommendations (exercises, suggestions).
section10.item1: These recommendations are for informational purposes only
section10.item2: They do not constitute medical advice
section10.item3: You are free to follow them or not
section10.item4: You can request human intervention for any decision concerning you

subsection1.title: 11.1 California residents (CCPA/CPRA)
subsection1.description: If you reside in California, you have additional rights:
subsection1.rightToKnowDesc: What data we collect and how we use it
subsection1.rightToOptOutDesc: Refuse the "sale" of your data (we do not sell your data)
subsection1.nonDiscriminationDesc: We will not discriminate against you for exercising your rights
subsection1.noSale: We do not sell your personal information within the meaning of CCPA.

subsection2.title: 11.2 Brazil residents (LGPD)
subsection2.description: If you reside in Brazil, you have the rights provided by the Lei Geral de ProteÃ§Ã£o de Dados.

subsection3.title: 11.3 Other jurisdictions
subsection3.description: We strive to comply with applicable data protection laws in each jurisdiction where we operate.

section12.title: 12. Changes to this policy
section12.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. In case of substantial modification:
section12.item1: We will notify you by email or notification in the Application
section12.item2: The "Last updated" date will be modified
section12.item3: Your continued use of the Service after notification constitutes acceptance of the changes

section13.title: 13. Contact us
section13.description: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights:
section13.responseTime: We commit to responding to any request within 30 days.

privacyPolicy.footer: This Privacy Policy is written in French and may be translated into other languages. In case of discrepancy, the French version prevails.

subsection5.title: 5.5 Cancellation
